content: आकृ {c8c} <ab>U.</ab> {c5c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To bring near or towards; to drive near or together. {@--2@} To bring down; form wholly (<ab>Ved.</ab>). {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To invite, call, summon; रदनिकामाकारय <ls>Mk. 3</ls>; <ls>Dk. 174</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1</ls>; मध्यस्थस्य दृष्टिमाकारयति <ls>Mk. 4</ls> calls or arrests; <ls>Śi. 16. 52.</ls> {@--2@} To prompt, incite, propel; ममापि कौतूहलेनाकारित एषः <ls>Ś. 6.</ls> {@--3@} To call out boldly, challenge; <ls>Mk. 2.</ls> {@--4@} To cause to appear, produce. {@--5@} To ask anything of one.
